Stockwell and Larkhall Labour councillors operate two surgeries a month on a rota basis. The surgeries are held at the Stockwell Centre, 1 Studley Road, SW4 6RA (behind Stockwell tube) on the first Thursday of the month at 6pm and the third Saturday of every month at 11am, lasting 1 hour.

surgerydetails.line2: Roving surgery - 2nd Wednesday 6.30-8pm
surgerydetails.line4: If you would like our roving surgery to come to your street because of a local issue you are aware of, please let us know.
